CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 14 reads: "Brick Masons At Work On Belmar Gardens - Belmar Gardens, the 118-unit cooperative housing development in Twelfth Ward, is providing employment for some Negro skilled workers as the building progresses...All the bricklayers are members of the Bricklayers International Union, Local No. 2. -Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Belmar Gardens construction site with unfinished brick building, workers, including one brick layer and one carrying wood board
